instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3332: What is 820-3332? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Furious FAN!
threads.message:
Hey Guys, here is my problem today:
The board is clean and everything works great, however, the fans spinning really fast.

AHT: 4SNS/1/40000001: ID0R-0.003

Any hint!?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Furious FAN!
threads.message: Run ASD155 and report what sensor errors you get.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Furious FAN!
threads.message:
You can try known good trackpad board/flex, if possible.
But ASD will show you any error.
Don't waste time with OS version, run only EFI one...
